document.discussion_title: Newmont Mining Corp (NEM) Raised to Buy at Zacks Investment Research - Financial Market News
document.topic_text: Filed Under: Analyst Articles - US - Markets Zacks Investment Research upgraded shares of Newmont Mining Corp (NYSE:NEM) from a hold rating to a buy rating in a research note released on Wednesday, AnalystRatings.NET reports. Zacks Investment Research currently has $35.00 price target on the mining company’s stock. According to Zacks, “Newmont swung to a loss on a reported basis in fourth-quarter 2015, hurt by lower gold and copper pricing. Adjusted earnings fell well short of the Zacks Consensus Estimate. Revenues fell by double digits on lower metals pricing, but beat expectations. Newmont is making notable progress with its growth projects that are expected to boost its production performance. We are also impressed by its cost management initiatives. Moreover, the acquisition of CC&V represents a significant opportunity for the company.” Newmont Mining Corp ( NYSE:NEM ) traded down 1.09% during trading on Wednesday, reaching $30.89. 4,095,499 shares of the company’s stock were exchanged. The stock has a market capitalization of $16.35 billion and a price-to-earnings ratio of 72.51. The company’s 50 day moving average price is $27.83 and its 200-day moving average price is $21.78. Newmont Mining Corp has a 52 week low of $15.39 and a 52 week high of $32.58. Newmont Mining Corp (NYSE:NEM) last posted its earnings results on Wednesday, April 20th. The mining company reported $0.34 earnings per share for the quarter, topping the Zacks’ consensus estimate of $0.20 by $0.14. During the same period in the prior year, the business posted $0.46 EPS. The firm had revenue of $2.03 billion for the quarter, compared to analyst estimates of $1.86 billion. The firm’s quarterly revenue was up 3.0% compared to the same quarter last year. On average, equities analysts expect that Newmont Mining Corp will post $1.09 EPS for the current year. The firm also recently declared a quarterly dividend, which will be paid on Thursday, June 23rd. Shareholders of record on Thursday, June 9th will be paid a $0.025 dividend. This represents a $0.10 annualized dividend and a yield of 0.32%. The ex-dividend date of this dividend is Tuesday, June 7th. A number of other equities research analysts also recently weighed in on NEM. Clarkson Capital downgraded Newmont Mining Corp from a buy rating to a neutral rating in a report on Monday, April 18th. Jefferies Group upgraded Newmont Mining Corp from a hold rating to a buy rating and raised their price target for the stock from $17.01 to $24.00 in a research report on Tuesday, January 12th. RBC Capital raised their price target on Newmont Mining Corp from $25.00 to $34.00 in a research report on Tuesday, April 12th. Standpoint Research cut Newmont Mining Corp from a buy rating to a hold rating in a research report on Friday, March 18th. Finally, Barclays raised their price target on Newmont Mining Corp from $26.00 to $33.00 and gave the stock an equal weight rating in a research report on Monday, April 18th. Nine analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating, nine have given a buy rating and one has issued a strong buy rating to the stock. The company presently has an average rating of Buy and a consensus target price of $28.17. A number of institutional investors have modified their holdings of NEM. Mutual of America Capital Management LLC raised its position in shares of Newmont Mining Corp by 0.5% in the fourth quarter. Mutual of America Capital Management LLC now owns 59,018 shares of the mining company’s stock valued at $1,062,000 after buying an additional 307 shares during the period. Gargoyle Investment Advisor L.L.C. increased its stake in Newmont Mining Corp by 2.2% in the fourth quarter. Gargoyle Investment Advisor L.L.C. now owns 39,503 shares of the mining company’s stock valued at $711,000 after buying an additional 862 shares in the last quarter. Afam Capital Inc. increased its stake in Newmont Mining Corp by 2.0% in the fourth quarter. Afam Capital Inc. now owns 70,854 shares of the mining company’s stock valued at $1,275,000 after buying an additional 1,376 shares in the last quarter. Chevy Chase Trust Holdings Inc. increased its stake in Newmont Mining Corp by 0.3% in the first quarter. Chevy Chase Trust Holdings Inc. now owns 667,719 shares of the mining company’s stock valued at $17,748,000 after buying an additional 1,834 shares in the last quarter. Finally, Twin Capital Management Inc. increased its stake in Newmont Mining Corp by 2.7% in the fourth quarter. Twin Capital Management Inc. now owns 85,770 shares of the mining company’s stock valued at $1,543,000 after buying an additional 2,260 shares in the last quarter. Newmont Mining Corporation ( NYSE:NEM ) is a global mining company, which is focused on the production of and exploration for gold and copper. The Company is primarily a gold producer with operations and/or assets in the United States, Australia, Peru, Indonesia, Ghana, New Zealand and Suriname. Get a free copy of the Zacks research report on Newmont Mining Corp (NEM) For more information about research offerings from Zacks Investment Research, visit Zacks.com Receive News & Ratings for Newmont Mining Corp Daily - Enter your email address below to receive a concise daily summary of the latest news and analysts' ratings for Newmont Mining Corp and related companies with MarketBeat.com's FREE daily email newsletter .
